SqlOperation.Name: GetAll
GetAllExtended
SqlOperation.TextCommand: SELECT s.*, w.Name as WorkspaceName, u.FullName as UserFullName FROM `sec_user_secrets` s INNER JOIN `wspc_workspaces` w ON s.WorkspaceId = w.Id INNER JOIN `idp_users` u ON s.UserId = u.Id WHERE s.`WorkspaceId` = @WorkspaceId AND s.`UserId` = @UserId ORDER BY s.`Name` ASC;

SqlOperation.Name: CountAll
SqlOperation.TextCommand: SELECT COUNT(Id) as Count FROM `sec_user_secrets` WHERE `WorkspaceId` = @WorkspaceId AND `UserId` = @UserId;

SELECT * FROM `sec_user_secrets` WHERE `WorkspaceId` = @WorkspaceId AND `UserId` = @UserId AND `Id` = @Id;
